about_the_game:
God of Terra: Crestfallen is a third person shooter that attempts to blend power fantasy gameplay with souls-like encounters while telling a grim-dark story.

"The long night is finally over, and the light of the Martyr shines upon us once more. Yet the forces of evil still plague our lands"

For thirty years the last remnants of humanity remained secluded in the Spire - a tower-fortress serving as the last beacon of light amidst the tide of darkness. At last, the long night is over, and we are free to roam the lands of our ancestors. Alas, there is no telling of how far the corruption has spread. Explore the land, purge the corruption, and may the wrath of the Martyr guide your aim.

  • Explore the lands surrounding the Spire and progress through the story

  • Complete challenging encounters to earn upgrade resources

  • Become an unstoppable force of light by upgrading your weapons and armor

content_descriptors.notes: Main gameplay focus is on fighting against humanoid enemies. Combat involves shooting firearms and medieval weaponry. Blood and gore are a frequent part of combat. Occasional mild language is present in character dialogues.
